node.title: Wellington water missing fluoride for six weeks
node.description: A Wellington City councillor is furious they were not told a large swathe of the capital's drinking water has not been fluoridated for six weeks.
node.content:
["A Wellington City councillor is furious they were not told a large swathe of the capital's drinking water has not been fluoridated for six weeks.", "", "
Waikato DHB says it's time to fluoridate again. Photo: AFP
", "Wellington Water turned off the fluoride for Upper Hutt, Porirua, Wellington City, Stokes Valley and Manor Park after a review found health and safety risks at two water treatment plants.", "Repairs could take up to nine months, and Wellington Water says it is working quickly.", "Councillor Fleur Fitzsimons says there is no excuse for not telling residents immediately.", "Meanwhile, the review found the decades-old fluoridation system is failing, and has been under-dosing for at least four years."]
